DESCRIPTION: Id cards are automatically used when drawn.
Whenever an enemy dies, heal HP equal to its Terror.
Whenever you gain #b15 Ephemeral, gain #b1 Intangible.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.

Whenever a mind controlled enemy deals damage or applies a debuff, a random enemy receives it instead. Whenever it applies a buff, you receive it instead. Whenever it gains Block or heals HP, you receive it as well.
